API_Description: Searches the specified document or index for the specified text. Properties associated with the `search` object (such as `matchCase` , `matchWholeWord` , `stem` ) may affect the result.

cQuery.description: The text for which to search.

cWhere.description: (optional) Specifies where the text should be searched. Values are:  ActiveDoc Folder Index ActiveIndexes  The default is ActiveIndexes.

cDIPath.description: (optional) A device-independent path to a folder or Catalog index on the user’s computer.  When cWhere is Folder or Index, this parameter is required.
